name: Last Chance (Elysium)
description:
Last Chance:  a simple survival horror RPG prototype set in a post-apocalyptic world full of zombies. you play as Jordyn Andrews, a 19 year old engineering student. you've found yourself far from home and therefore you must find a way to your family. enter the barren land of Last Chance and uncover the story hidden in plain sight around you. 

(prototype only contains one level.)
